author: jstrachan
msg: Added core conditional tags from JSTL with a little example

author: jstrachan
msg: Modified the core tags so that the common tags expect an expression for their attributes. Tags which do not explicitly expect an expression for their attribute values can take {} around the expressions which will then be evaluated as an expression. This is kinda similar to 'Attribute Value Templates' in XSLT. It certainly makes common core tags look much simpler. Also added a sample script to output the current system properties as a HTML table to show the general idea
